INTJ.name: Architect
INTJ.tagline: Imaginative and strategic thinkers, with a plan for everything.
INTJ.description: INTJs are imaginative and strategic thinkers who are always prepared. They are independent, decisive, and hold themselves and others to high standards. They excel at spotting flaws in systems and creating long-term plans to achieve their goals.

INTP.name: Logician
INTP.tagline: Innovative inventors with an unquenchable thirst for knowledge.
INTP.description: INTPs are innovative inventors with an unquenchable thirst for knowledge. They view the world with unique perspectives and vibrant intelligence, always seeing possibilities that others overlook.

ENTJ.name: Commander
ENTJ.tagline: Bold, imaginative and strong-willed leaders, always finding a way or making one.
ENTJ.description: ENTJs are natural leaders with strong drive and determination. They are confident, decisive, and excel at organizing people to achieve goals. They always see the big picture and inspire others to follow.

ENTP.name: Debater
ENTP.tagline: Smart and curious thinkers who cannot resist an intellectual challenge.
ENTP.description: ENTPs are smart thinkers who love intellectual challenges. They excel at debating, can see multiple angles of issues, and enjoy intellectual sparring.

INFJ.name: Advocate
INFJ.tagline: Quiet and mysterious, but profoundly inspiring.
INFJ.description: INFJs pursue meaningful relationships, are insightful, and can inspire others. They are natural leaders with strong values and a desire to change the world.

INFP.name: Mediator
INFP.tagline: Poetic, kind and altruistic souls, always eager to help a good cause.
INFP.description: INFPs are true idealists, always looking for the good in everything, even in things that aren't so good. They are creative and have a deep understanding of human nature.

ENFJ.name: Protagonist
ENFJ.tagline: Charismatic and inspiring leaders, able to captivate their audience.
ENFJ.description: ENFJs are natural leaders, full of passion and charisma. They can inspire others to achieve goals and excel at understanding others' feelings and motivations.

ENFP.name: Campaigner
ENFP.tagline: Enthusiastic, creative and sociable free spirits, who can always find a reason to smile.
ENFP.description: ENFPs are true free spirits who often become the life of the party. They are outgoing, enthusiastic, but also deeply thoughtful, seeking genuine connections.

ISTJ.name: Logistician
ISTJ.tagline: Practical and fact-minded individuals, whose reliability cannot be doubted.
ISTJ.description: ISTJs are serious, reliable, and responsible. They value tradition and loyalty, prefer organized work. They are excellent organizers who can get things done perfectly.

ISFJ.name: Defender
ISFJ.tagline: Very dedicated and warm protectors, always ready to defend their loved ones.
ISFJ.description: ISFJs are very warm, responsible, and enjoy helping others. They value harmony and cooperation, have a strong sense of responsibility towards others, and are the most loyal friends.

ESTJ.name: Executive
ESTJ.tagline: Excellent administrators, unsurpassed at managing things or people.
ESTJ.description: ESTJs are excellent organizers who love order and tradition. They are practical, realistic, can effectively manage projects and people, and are natural leaders.

ESFJ.name: Consul
ESFJ.tagline: Extraordinarily caring, social and popular people, always eager to help.
ESFJ.description: ESFJs are very social people who enjoy helping others. They value harmony, are excellent team members, and can always create a warm atmosphere.

ISTP.name: Virtuoso
ISTP.tagline: Bold and practical experimenters, masters of all kinds of tools.
ISTP.description: ISTPs are natural makers who enjoy hands-on problem solving. They are calm and collected, excel in crises, and have a natural understanding of machinery and systems.

ISFP.name: Adventurer
ISFP.tagline: Flexible and charming artists, always ready to explore and experience something new.
ISFP.description: ISFPs are true artists who use their senses to appreciate beauty. They are flexible, charming, enjoy exploring and experiencing new things, pursuing freedom and self-expression.

ESTP.name: Entrepreneur
ESTP.tagline: Smart, energetic and very perceptive people, who truly enjoy living on the edge.
ESTP.description: ESTPs never lack energy, they love drama, passion, and pleasure. They live in the moment, act quickly, and are natural adventurers.

ESFP.name: Entertainer
ESFP.tagline: Spontaneous, energetic and enthusiastic people - life is never boring with them.
ESFP.description: ESFPs are natural performers who love the spotlight. They are full of energy, enjoy entertaining others, and are the best at enjoying life.
